1327220.name: Derpy Conga Demo
1327220.description:
A physics-based puzzle-platformer about the importance of friendship!
Gather all your friends and take them on a journey to save their endangered planet!
Take their hand as you find them and form a conga line to be sure not to leave anyone behind but be careful: the longer the line, the harder to control!
On the other hand (haha!), certain obstacles are easier to overcome when you have friends on your side.

Search for Friends

Explore beautiful and lively alien worlds as you travel through space to look out for your friends.
Once you found them, take them by their hand and never let go again!

Different friends, different abilities

On your journey, you'll meet different kind of friends: each of them has different abilities that can be used to get past obstacles and to solve puzzles.

State of the project

Derpy Conga is currently under development in the lovely city of Cologne, Germany.
You can follow the development of the game on Twitter, or directly wishlist it to not forget about it <3.
1327220.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 荷兰语, 简体中文
